title: At Kupyansk axis clashes yesterday near Holubivka, Petropavlivka, Pischane, Hlushkivka, Zelenyi Hai, Zahryzove, Kruhlyakivka,...
content: At Kupyansk axis clashes yesterday near Holubivka, Petropavlivka, Pischane, Hlushkivka, Zelenyi Hai, Zahryzove, Kruhlyakivka, Pershotravneve and Lozova, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine reports
